Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.View.TUI.ViewStates

package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.View.TUI.ViewStates
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.Client.View.TUI
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.Client.View.TUI.Components
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChatState
    Represents the chat state in the TUI, allowing users to send and view chat messages.
    ComplexState
    Represents a complex state that can switch between different interactive components based on user input.
    ConnectionState
    Represents the connection state where the client attempts to connect to the server.
    DrawState
    Represents the state where players can draw cards during the game.
    GameOverState
    Represents the state of the game when it is over.
    GamePickObjectiveState
    Represents the state of the game where the player picks a secret objective.
    GameState
    Abstract class representing the state of the game within the lobby.
    InteractiveState
    Abstract class representing a state with interactive components.
    LobbyJoinedState
    Represents the state when a player has joined a lobby.
    LobbySelectionState
    Represents the state where the player is selecting a lobby to join.
    LobbyStates
    Abstract class that all classes AFTER joining a lobby have to implement to allow for the "quit" and "chat" functionality.
    LoginSignUpState
    Represents the state where the player logs in or signs up.
    PlaceState
    Represents the state where players are placing their cards on the board.
    StarterPlaceState
    Represents the state where players choose the starting cards to place on the board.
    ViewState
    Abstract class representing the state of the client in the game.
    WaitState
    Represents the state where players are waiting for their turn or for the game setup to complete.
